problem_text_cn: 如图所示,在边长为1的单位正方形组成的网格中,△ABC的顶点都在网格的交点上,则△ABC的外接圆半径R为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in a grid composed of unit squares with edge length N_0, the vertices of △ABC are all at the intersection of the grid, then the radius R of the circumscribe of △ABC is ()
raw_answer:
解:作AC、AB的垂直平分线交于点O,则点O为△ABC的外接圆圆心,连接OA,
则OA=√{2^{2}+1^{2}}=√{5},
故选:A．
